Angular ES6 Webpack Bootstrap

This project uses Angular with ES6 .
The styles are applied through Bootstrap .
Bundling is done thorugh Webpack which gives added benifit of LiveReload and Hot Module Reload .
Github
https://github.com/rudrapanda117/AngularWebpackBootstrapES6.git
